title: Riot When do hextech chests get re-rolled on champions i already got a hextech chest?
body:
Yeah 

soo basically i was wondering when are the hextexh chests get re-rolled on champions i already got a hextech chest with??

replies.body:
I think you're asking when chests will reset so you can earn hextech chests for champions you've already earned one on in this season. Because these are only once per champ per season, it *should* reset at the beginning of the next season.

Check out our [Hectech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for additional details. Let me know if you have any questions.
I don't know for sure, and the Hextech Crafting Guide doesn't quite specify. I would wager it would be the beginning of the full-swing season.

i thought it was after a 365-day cycle. I don' t remember the wordings correctly but it was somehow stated that you have a precise amount of chests you can gain that was sorta equal to 50-52, which are the weeks on each year. you get new chest chance roughly every week so it should check out.

Besides hextech was added in february, with beta started in january, so it makes sense it refreshes every start of year. sorta.
